titleStmt.title: The reformation of the Church of Ireland, in the life and death of George Browne some time Arch-bishop of Dublin, being the first of the Romish clergy that adhered here in Ireland, to the reformation of the Protestant Church of England; being then reformed within this realm of Ireland. Anno 1551.
titleStmt.author: Ware, Robert, d. 1696.
Browne, George, d. 1556.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Jos. Ray ... for Jos. Howes ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Ware by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland) Library.
